order module¶

class order.Order¶

Bases: object

A class to represent a customer’s pizza order.

Attributes:

pizzas (list): A list of Pizza objects in the order. cost (float): The total cost of the order. paid (bool): A boolean indicating if the order has been paid for.

input_pizza(crust, sauces, cheese, toppings)¶

Creates a new pizza and adds it to the order.

order_paid()¶

Marks the order as paid.

update_cost()¶

Updates the total cost of the order by summing the costs of all pizzas.
